alert.note: Alert for West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 8:23PM MDT until March 31 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO NOON MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Park and northern Gore Ranges, including Rabbit Ears Pass. * WHEN...From Noon Thursday to Noon MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roads. Blowing snow will reduce visibility. Travel could be hazardous, especially late Thursday and early Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: West Jackson and West Grand Counties Above 9000 Feet
